column1: Mozes Kilangin Airport (also known as Timika Airport) (IATA: TIM
column2: ICAO: WAYY is an airport in Timika
column4: Indonesia. The Airport is located 5 km north from town center. The airport provides safe and secure short term and long term parking for your vehicle during your trip. The operation of the Airport is managed by UPT Ditjen Hubud
column5: an agency under Ministry of Transportation
column6: Indonesia. Flight Destinations Mozes Kilangin Airport is served by few local airlines such as Airfast Indonesia
column8: Susi Air and Sriwijaya Air with Jayapura and Denpasar are the most popular routes. Airline Name Destination Airfast Indonesia Makassar
